sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action restarts the Jenkins Server.

Inputs:

  • Restart Type - The type of restart to be selected. Select either of 'Safe Restart' or 'Restart' from the drop down list.
    • Safe Restart - Allows all running jobs to complete. New jobs will remain in the queue to run after the restart is complete.
    • Force Restart - Forces a restart without waiting for builds to complete.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Provided value for Restart Type is invalid.
  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • You do not have enough permissions to perform this action on Jenkins.

To use this action, the corresponding Jenkins connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jenkins Connection & Credential alias.

Disclaimer:Jenkins and Jenkins logo are a registered trademark of Jenkins.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Restart Jenkins

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
This action restarts the Jenkins Server.

Inputs:

  • Restart Type - The type of restart to be selected. Select either of 'Safe Restart' or 'Restart' from the drop down list.
    • Safe Restart - Allows all running jobs to complete. New jobs will remain in the queue to run after the restart is complete.
    • Force Restart - Forces a restart without waiting for builds to complete.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Provided value for Restart Type is invalid.
  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • You do not have enough permissions to perform this action on Jenkins.

To use this action, the corresponding Jenkins connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jenkins Connection & Credential alias.

Disclaimer:Jenkins and Jenkins logo are a registered trademark of Jenkins.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.name: Restart Jenkins
